sentences.en: At the time, kindred were linked together chiefly through the band of their maternity.
sentences.cn: 那时联系亲属的纽带以母方为主.

sentences.cn: 目前提出的新问题中有的关系到产假和儿童照料等.

sentences.en: Gynaecologists at Aberdeen Maternity Hospital have successfully used the drug on 60 women.
sentences.cn: 阿伯丁妇产医院的妇科医生在60位女性身上成功使用了该药。

sentences.en: In recent years women employees in some units have been given six months'paid maternity leave.
sentences.cn: 近几年,有些单位的女职工实际享有半年的带薪产假.

sentences.en: Maternity services were to be reduced in consequence of falling birth rates.
sentences.cn: 由于出生率下降，产科服务会随之削减。

sentences.en: She's been given sick / compassionate / maternity leave.
sentences.cn: 她获准休病假[事假/产假].

sentences.en: The boy was born at the city's maternity hospital.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩出生在市妇产医院。

sentences.en: The pregnant woman looked forward to her maternity.
Toronto hospital maternity wards were filled to capacity.
sentences.cn: 多伦多医院的产房都已住满了。

sentences.en: Trainee nurses have to work for some weeks in maternity.
sentences.cn: 受训的护士必须在产科病房工作数周.

sentences.en: Women are entitled to maternity leave.
Women workers are entitled to maternity leave with full pay.
sentences.cn: 女工产假期间工资照发.

sentences.en: Your job will be kept open for your return after maternity leave.
sentences.cn: 你的工作会一直保留到你休完产假回来。
